name: Our World in Data CO2 and Greenhouse Gas Emissions dataset
dataset_datasetUpdateMechanism: We will continue to publish updated data on CO2 and Greenhouse Gas Emissions as it becomes available. Most metrics are published on an annual basis.
dataset_intendedUse: To make the research and data about carbon dioxide and greenhouse gas emissions accessible and understandable.
dataset_knownBias: Data in some geographical areas are more completed than the others.
